venue.address_1: parking lot (park on left side)---intersection of thoreau and walden streets
venue.name: hapgood-wright town forest

item.description:
135 acres to explore! though only traipsing through a small part, we will choose the most enchanting portion. we'll search for flowers, frogs, turtles, birds....but also peer into secluded nooks where fairies may lurk. think up some great wishes, 'cause they must grant them if we catch one!

spring is here! hooray! there is so much activity and transformation happening---right now!; such a great time to search and discover. please join us (that's my wish!).
item.how_to_find_us: my vehicle: red jeep with big wheels (unless those fairies transform it into a big pumpkin......if so, look for a big, red pumpkin).
item.why: it's beautiful (and imbued with magical fairy charm).
item.name: fairyland pond
